descriptions: No attempt to create or use organized lists or tables.
Attempts to create lists/tables but they are incomplete, disorganized, or inaccurate.
Creates lists/tables with some organization, but contains errors or omissions that impact probability calculations.
Creates organized lists/tables to represent sample space, but may have minor errors.
Creates clear, organized, and accurate lists/tables to represent the sample space of a compound event.
Creates exemplary lists/tables, clearly demonstrating all possible outcomes and facilitating accurate probability calculations; demonstrates creative and efficient organization.
No attempt to create or use tree diagrams.
Attempts to create a tree diagram but it is incomplete, disorganized, or inaccurate.
Creates a tree diagram with some organization, but contains errors or omissions that impact probability calculations.
Creates a tree diagram to represent sample space, but may have minor errors.
Creates a clear, organized, and accurate tree diagram to represent the sample space of a compound event.
Creates an exemplary tree diagram, clearly demonstrating all possible outcomes and facilitating accurate probability calculations; labels diagram effectively.
No attempt to use simulation to find probabilities.
Attempts a simulation but the methodology is flawed or not clearly defined.
Uses simulation with some success, but with limited trials or unclear representation of the compound event.
Uses simulation appropriately to estimate probabilities, but may have minor inconsistencies in the process.
Uses simulation effectively with a sufficient number of trials to estimate probabilities of compound events; clearly explains the simulation process.
Designs and executes a simulation with a high degree of accuracy and efficiency to determine probabilities; validates the simulation results with theoretical probabilities.
No understanding of how to calculate probabilities of compound events.
Attempts to calculate probabilities but demonstrates significant misunderstanding of the underlying concepts.
Calculates probabilities with some errors, showing partial understanding of compound events.
Calculates probabilities of compound events with reasonable accuracy, but may struggle with interpreting the results.
Accurately calculates and interprets probabilities of compound events, expressing results as fractions of outcomes in the sample space.
Demonstrates a deep understanding of compound event probabilities, providing clear and insightful interpretations and connecting them to real-world scenarios.
